timeline.bodyText:
🤔
acquire() could throw.
I know it is rare, but there is nothing preventing the model being evicted from cache before these listeners are notified.
Maybe call acquire before putting in cache.
Then, outside the sync block, calling loadedModel.release() once all the listeners have been notified?
It seems funky, but it guarantees the acquire in the listener loop will not throw as it will never reach 0.
